co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch

Interface BatchContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatasetContext, LookupProvider, StageContext, TransformContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatchAggregatorContext, BatchJoinerContext, BatchSinkContext, BatchSourceContext, SparkPluginContext

    @Beta
public interface BatchContext
extends DatasetContext, TransformContext
    Context passed to Batch Source and Sink.

    • Method Detail

      • createDataset

        void createDataset(String datasetName,
                 String typeName,
                 DatasetProperties properties)
                   throws DatasetManagementException
        Create a new dataset instance.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the new dataset
        typeName - the type of the dataset to create
        properties - the properties for the new dataset
        Throws:
        InstanceConflictException - if the dataset already exists
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system, or if the dataset type's create method fails.

      • datasetExists

        boolean datasetExists(String datasetName)
                      throws DatasetManagementException
        Check whether a dataset exists in the current namespace.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the dataset
        Returns:
        whether a dataset of that name exists
        Throws:
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system

      • getLogicalStartTime

        long getLogicalStartTime()
        Returns the logical start time of the Batch Job. Logical start time is the time when this Batch job is supposed to start if this job is started by the scheduler. Otherwise it would be the current time when the job runs.
        Returns:
        Time in milliseconds since epoch time (00:00:00 January 1, 1970 UTC).

      • getRuntimeArguments

        Map<String,String> getRuntimeArguments()
        Returns runtime arguments of the Batch Job.
        Returns:
        runtime arguments of the Batch Job.

      • setRuntimeArgument

        void setRuntimeArgument(String key,
                      String value,
                      boolean overwrite)
        Updates an entry in the runtime arguments.
        Parameters:
        key - key to update
        value - value to update to
        overwrite - if true and if the key exists in the runtime arguments, it will get overwritten to the given value; if false, the existing value of the key won't get updated.

      • getHadoopJob

        @Deprecated
<T> T getHadoopJob()
        Deprecated. this method will be removed.
        Returns the hadoop job.
